    Class and Description
    org.jetel.data.primitive.CloverDate
    Jun 7, 2013 krivanekm - obsolete, Calendar does not respect time zones
    org.jetel.util.primitive.DuplicateKeyMap
    use MultiValueMap instead
    org.jetel.data.primitive.NumericFormat

    replaced with PooledSFTPOperationHandler.

    since the connections are pooled, changing the current directory is a potentially dangerous operation. Should not be used from URLConnection anyway.

    org.jetel.util.file.FileUtils.getTarInputStreams(InputStream, String, List)
    This method does not really work, it is not possible to open multiple TarInputStreams from one parent input stream without extensive buffering. Use FileUtils.getMatchingTarEntries(InputStream, String) to resolve wildcards or FileUtils.getTarInputStream(InputStream, String) to open a TarInputStream.

    org.jetel.util.string.StringUtils.isBlank(CharBuffer)
    Does not recognize ASCII control (Unicode C0 control) characters, such as tab (09), CR (13), LF (10) and others to be blank. Use UnicodeBlanks.isBlank(CharSequence) instead.
    org.jetel.util.string.StringUtils.isBlank(CharSequence)
    Does not recognize ASCII control (Unicode C0 control) characters, such as tab (09), CR (13), LF (10) to be blank. Use UnicodeBlanks.isBlank(CharSequence) instead.
    org.jetel.data.RecordKey.isComparedNulls()
    Temporary workaround until compareTo() will throw exception.

    org.jetel.util.string.StringUtils.isPrintableChar(char)
    This function wrongly marks many characters (e.g. U+2144) as non-printable See UnicodeBlanks.

    org.jetel.data.parser.Parser.reset()
    this method was substituted by pair of another methods Parser.preExecute() and Parser.postExecute(). Reset parser for next graph execution.
    org.jetel.graph.EdgeBase.reset()
    org.jetel.graph.GraphElement.reset()
    see IGraphElement.preExecute() and IGraphElement.postExecute() methods
    org.jetel.graph.IGraphElement.reset()
    this method was substituted by pair of another methods IGraphElement.preExecute() and IGraphElement.postExecute(). This method should be invoked automatically by IGraphElement.preExecute() method for backward compatibility. Restore all internal element settings to the initial state. Cannot be called before init() and after free() method invocation.
    org.jetel.graph.Node.reset()
    org.jetel.graph.Phase.reset()

    Replaced by preExecute(), postExecute() Reset reader for next graph execution.

    to turn off the special characters resolving call resolveRef(value, RefResOption.ALL_OFF) instead
